credentialSubject.description: Stores the data of the credential
credentialSubject.title: Credential subject

id.description: Stores the DID of the subject that owns the credential
id.title: Credential subject ID

state_name.description: Name of the state where the land is located.
state_name.title: State Name

district_name.description: Name of the district where the land is located.
district_name.title: District Name

tehsil_name.description: Name of the tehsil (sub-district) where the land is located.
tehsil_name.title: Tehsil Name

village_name.description: Name of the village where the land is located.
village_name.title: Village Name

survey_number.description: Official survey number of the land parcel.
survey_number.title: Survey Number

sub_survey_number.description: Sub-survey number of the land parcel, if applicable.
sub_survey_number.title: Sub Survey Number

land_owner_name.description: Name of the land owner as per official records.
land_owner_name.title: Land Owner Name

ownership_type.description: Type of ownership (e.g., Sole, Joint, Ancestral).
ownership_type.title: Ownership Type

owner_share.description: Percentage of ownership share held by the individual (e.g., 100 for 100%).
owner_share.title: Owner Share

irrigation_status.description: Irrigation status of the land (e.g., Irrigated, Rainfed, Dry).
irrigation_status.title: Irrigation Status

mortgage_status.description: Indicates whether the land is currently mortgaged.
mortgage_status.title: Mortgage Status

court_case.description: Indicates whether the land is currently involved in a court case or dispute.
court_case.title: Court Case

land_area.description: Total area of the land parcel (e.g., in acres, hectares).
land_area.title: Land Area

name_match_percentage.description: Percentage indicating the match between provided name and PAN name (0-100)
name_match_percentage.title: Name Match Percentage

credentialStatus.description: Allows the discovery of information about the current status of the credential, such as whether it is suspended or revoked.
credentialStatus.title: Credential Status

type.description: Expresses the credential status type (method). The value should provide enough information to determine the current status of the credential.
type.title: Type
